bug.author: azamsharp
bug.description: The code included: <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/style_transfer/>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/style_transfer/</denchmark-link> does not at all. It throws the following exception. failed assertion `MTLTextureDescriptor has height (65536) greater than the maximum allowed size of 16384.' Even though the image size for test, content and style images are 256 X 256.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/azamsharp>@azamsharp</denchmark-link> - what operating system are you using?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/azamsharp>@azamsharp</denchmark-link> - I just ran the style transfer code from the user guide on macOS Catalina. It works fine for me. Could you please provide the full output/stack-trace? Also it would be helpful to know some details about your dataset.
